interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: ilapothecary Express Lip Balm 15g
Review Date: 2021/08/20
Store: ilapothecary
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Ilapothecary', 'Item Form': 'Balm', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Color': 'Rose', 'Product Benefits': 'Nourishing'}
Review Text: This Ilapothecary express lip balm delivers instant softness to dry and chapped lips and that is my favorite part of the product. It's great for every day use. My not so favorite part is the overpowering smell and sometimes taste of the balm. If you love the strong smell of roses this is definitely for you.
Review Title: strong scent and taste
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Hetian Sonic Facial Cleansing Brush，Exfoliating and Waterproof Electric Face Wash Brush Deep Skin Care Tools Silicone Cleanser Scrubber Suitable for Any Skin Condition for Women (Pink)
Hetian
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '6.3 x 1.5 x 1.77 inches; 5.89 Ounces', 'Batteries': '1 AA batteries required.', 'UPC': '791568745273', 'Manufacturer': 'Hetian'}
I've been told by my girlfriend that compared to other skin care brushes that this model is comparable or better than most. The device leaves your skin feeling softer after a few uses, so it may take more than your first use to see effects.
Noticeable difference
Bold Men, Mens Hair Brush For Head and Beard, Thick and Thin Hair Types
BOLD MEN
{'Brand': 'BOLD MEN', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Handle Material': 'Wood', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoothing', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '2.36 x 2.36 x 1.97 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '793611800557'}
I like that this brush is small enough to fit comfortably in my palm, but I expected the bristles to be more dense like other hair/beard brushes I've used in the past. However, it works well and I have not had any issue with it at all.
Bristles are not densely packed
Spanature Olive Hand & Body Lotion Travel Size Selection, 4 Pack, Revitalizing Moisturizer for Rough and Dry Skin, Nourishing and Gentle for All Skin Types, Made In Korea - 75 ml/2.53oz
Spanature
{'Brand': 'Spanature', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Use for': 'Hands', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.1 x 1.89 x 1.5 inches; 2.4 Ounces'}
I really liked that each lotion was individually boxed in a gift box. I kept one for myself and gifted the others and I'm kind of starting to regret it since I'm really liking how it leaves my hands feeling. The lotion left my skin feeling soft and rehydrated without that film like feeling that other lotions tend to leave
Great gift idea
Face Scrub by Disco for Men, Exfoliating and Cleansing, Removes Dead Skin and Build Up, All Natural and Paraben Free, Eucalyptus Scent, 2 Ounces
Disco
{'Brand': 'Disco', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliating', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Scent': 'Eucalyptus', 'Package Dimensions': '6.1 x 1.81 x 1.81 inches; 2 Ounces', 'UPC': '860001694727'}
Disco face scrub left my skin feeling soft and the smell was a plus. I have used it over the last week and have liked that it isn't too rough of a scrub.
So far it has been working great
Spanature Aloe Vera Hand & Body Lotion Travel Size Selection, 4 Pack, Relaxing and Revitalizing Moisturizer for Rough and Dry Skin, Nourishing and Gentle for All Skin Types, Made In Korea - 75 ml/2.53oz
Spanature
{'Brand': 'Spanature', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '10.1 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Use for': 'Hands', 'Package Dimensions': '4.21 x 3.62 x 2.8 inches; 1.05 Pounds', 'UPC': '088234470585'}
This is the second lotion from Spanature I have received and I like just as much as the previous one. It leaves my skin feeling soft and refreshed without having a weird slimey feeling that other lotions leave. They also come in gift boxes, so you can gift them with little effort.
Another great lotion from Spanature
3-piece makeup sponge set with Powder Brush， makeup sponges sponge makeup Mixed sponge foundation sponge make up blender Wet and dry makeup sponge (Red black pink + brush pen)
Qiaohanbao
{'Brand': 'Qiaohanbao', 'Material': 'Sponge,Polyurethane', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '1.57 x 1.57 x 2.36 inches', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.57 x 1.57 x 2.36 inches; 4.16 Ounces', 'UPC': '746581290361'}
I don't like the way the brush opens and closes but it does work fine. I do however love the sponges it came with. The sponges are really soft and blend my makeup. The sponges provide ease for foundation application as well.
Not a fan of the brush but love the sponges
45PCS Hair Elastic Ties, Big Durable Rubber Bands with High Elasticity-56mm diameter for Women Girls with Long Heavy Thick Curly Hair, Strong ponytail Hairband holders, by XieNie(Black)
XieNie
{'Material': 'Plastic, Rubber', 'Item Form': 'Elastic', 'Brand': 'XieNie', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Item Weight': '1.5 Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '5.47 x 3.94 x 1.18 inches; 1.5 Ounces', 'Item model number': '210406BTB', 'UPC': '628094759446'}
These hair ties are awesome. They are a bit different than what I'm used to using. I have thick hair and my hair ties usually break or become stretched out after using for a short time. These seem like they will last longer and do an amazing job of keeping my pony tail up all day
keeps hair up all day
Taaji Large Hair Clips for Women(3 PACK), Metal Hair Claw Clips,Hair Catch Barrette Jaw Clamp for Women Half Bun Hairpins for Thick Hair (Silver + Gold + Rose Gold)
Taaji
{'Brand': 'Taaji', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Color': 'Silver', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Embellishment': 'Nozzle', 'Product Dimensions': '2.99 x 1.65 x 0.79 inches; 3 Ounces', 'UPC': '727448938701'}
I have really thick hear which is sometimes unmanageable and these hair clips have been some of the best I have ever tried. They really hold my hair in place and get a nice grip for extended periods of time. The colors are also beautiful and go with just about everything.
great for hard to clip hair
Mineral Sun Block by Disco for Men, Moisturizing, SPF 30, All Natural and Paraben Free, 2 Ounces
Disco
{'Item Weight': '2 Ounces', 'Unit Count': '2.0 Ounce', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '2 x 1 x 5 inches', 'Brand': 'Disco', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 1 x 5 inches; 2 Ounces', 'UPC': '860006771652'}
I wish this product came in a bigger size but I also do love the 2 ounce size because I can take it with me everywhere which enables me to be better at remembering to apply sunblock every time I go out and makes it easily accessible. The Disco mineral sunblock is very lightweight and smells great. I really like that it is free of harmful ingredients
Disco mineral sunblock is the way to go

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Skincare and Makeup Focus:** The user prioritizes effective skincare tools and products, with a growing interest in makeup application tools that enhance usability and performance.
- **Quality Expectation:** They seek measurable improvements, valuing gradual results over instant effects.
- **Influenced by Recommendations:** Peer suggestions are crucial in their product choices across skincare, grooming, and makeup categories.
- **Willingness to Experiment:** Open to trying various brands and models, the user chooses products based on positive feedback, especially in grooming tools.
- **Moisturizer Appreciation:** They prefer hydrators that provide moisture without a greasy feel and value thoughtful personal care items.
- **Emphasis on Natural Ingredients:** The user is drawn to natural and gentle formulations that promote overall skin health.
- **Makeup Application Interest:** There is a growing focus on tools that improve texture and ease of makeup application.
- **Sun Care Awareness:** The user is proactive about effective sun protection, favoring lightweight and portable options with safe ingredients.
- **Hair Accessories Adoption:** They show a strong interest in durable hair accessories for thick, unmanageable hair, prioritizing quality and usability.
- **Lip Care Sensitivity:** Recent interactions highlight a preference for nourishing lip products, though notable scents and tastes can impact enjoyment, indicating the user’s discerning taste in fragrance and formulation.

Overall, the user reflects a discerning, exploratory attitude towards personal care, valuing gradual effectiveness, quality, natural formulations, and practicality, while becoming increasingly proactive in sun care and lip care awareness.
